Parameters: AudioDeviceInfo: An array of @B_android#media#AudioDeviceInfo_E@ objects corresponding to any newly added audio devices.
onAudioDevicesAdded(android.media.AudioD.Description: Called by the @B_android#media#AudioManager_E@ to indicate that one or more audio devices have been connected.

Parameters: AudioDeviceInfo: An array of @B_android#media#AudioDeviceInfo_E@ objects corresponding to any newly removed audio devices.
onAudioDevicesRemoved(android.media.Audi.Description: Called by the @B_android#media#AudioManager_E@ to indicate that one or more audio devices have been disconnected.

ClassDesc: AudioDeviceCallback defines the mechanism by which applications can receive notifications of audio device connection and disconnection events.
